Title: Pretty good
Author: Dollynz
Content: I have had very few issues with this app watching F1 and the RWC.  Good coverage, happy with it so far.

Title: No problems at all
Author: Kiwi201902
Content: While I have heard a lot of people had issues streaming the RWC, I have personally have had no problems at all in streaming live or watching recorded shows. I suspect it is the users broadband connection which might be to blame.

Title: Awful
Author: tmodeadman
Content: The biggest piece of junk I’ve ever had the displeasure of using. Cancelling my subscription.

Title: Hangs in the advertisements and transitions
Author: Phonia
Content: Still very much beta stage, regularly hangs and have to manually back up and press play to restart.

Title: Mislead and disappointed
Author: HelenEM1234
Content: I don’t recall at all being aware the RWC semi finals and finals were going to be free to air when I bought the tournament pass.  I feel totally mislead in this regard.  The pool matches were glitchy.  Really regret this purchase.

Title: Worse than ever
Author: Qu1nnie
Content:
I’m disappointed i can’t rate 0 stars for this, as it deserves no rating. The app is worse than ever and buggy, being so full of corporate greed i’m surprised you are able to see or understand anything beyond your selfish little world. Can’t watch anything without having to reset the internet, login 10 times and then disappointedly watch the audio and video out of sync, laggy and terrible quality. 

Anyone who made the decision to release this app and push forward with it should be locked up and the key thrown away. Congratulations on ruining a countries sporting support, with one flick of a switch. I feel bad for anyone working on this project, and I apologise for you having to read this. But your ‘higher-ups’ are terrible greedy selfish disgraces to this Nation. They deserve to be known and all the hate directed on them rather than the frantically working coders who have been thrown unceremoniously into this. 

Have a terrible day

Yours truly,

New Zealand

Title: Excellent step forward
Author: G Tr
Content:
Great App. Works very well. Kiwis needs to grow up and accept the change and stop winging.
Keep doing the great work Spark Sport Team 
Well done 👍🏽

Title: Can’t even sign in, useless.
Author: lannie16
Content: Downloaded app, won’t accept my spark app password, so tried to reset password. It says it has sent me an email. Don’t know where it’s sent it to, because I didn’t get it.

Title: Rubbish
Author: Pastetaster
Content:
Thanks Spark - NOT - you’re wrecking the Rugby World Cup.
Technology should take us forward not backwards.
Unforgivably poor performance.
You don’t deserve the rights.

Title: Terrible
Author: racharia
Content: Will not cast to apple tv. Dont bother wasting your money on this

Title: This is the worst app! Unstable, unreliable and generally useless.
Author: Inapinny
Content: Hangs and freezes during the ads. A huge disappointment.

Title: Won’t stream to Apple TV
Author: Adhfgj
Content:
Reasonably expensive for something that works sometimes. It’s ok if your watching a movie and it buffers a little bit but I’ve ended up watching the World Cup at a mates house who has a VPN 

won’t stream content to Apple TV either which is a bit of a bbq stopper

Title: Reliable App
Author: rollingdowns
Content: I use the app daily through AppleTV, iPad and occasionally iPhone. Had an issue pre-world cup telling me I had too many devices logged in. Logged out, deleted app and reloaded and no problems whatsoever since. Only real bugbear is no opportunity to download and watch offline, given I spend 3hrs a day commuting I really need this

Title: Cheaper than sky, but for far less actual rugby
Author: steve9ace
Content: Error after error every time I try watch using the mobile app. One time it’s telling me I’m not in New Zealand when I’m sitting at home in Auckland. The next it’s an invalid response received from manifest request Status code 403 3006. Has been a very poor customer experience where I’ve seen more errors than games when trying to use the app. Not impressed as it’s operated like a beta while the full price is charged to customers. ‘Tis the sad reality of the predatory nature of the market nowadays as they know customers will pay regardless.

Title: Overreaching
Author: jpq#
Content: This is the first review I’ve ever given on anything. Why? Why did you decide to do this when it’s obvious you can’t? Yet again my planned RWC evening has already been ruined and I’m only a third of the way through. The app continually crashes, the picture quality is appalling and I even had the famous green and purple lines for the first time. And it’s not my set up because sometimes - maybe 25% - it all works fine with good quality picture. The app is a disgrace and whoever made the “bold audacious” decision to go for it should hang their head in shame. Or has he left already?

Title: Speed is ok. But functionality does not work properly
Author: noyb...nz
Content:
Very poor functionality overall

Going through the menus is difficult on a Apple TV despite the fact that this app has been recently released

Many things do NOT work in the way that you would expect and on top of that there are errors

For example when you attempt to go into a LIVE match and select “play from the start”, this does not work and jumps you to the current time to watch it Live so instead of going to enjoy the full match in one case I jumped into it at 68 minutes and 44 seconds. Really poor that Something this obvious was not tested.

Spark, raise your game, and stop being so arrogant. You are no longer a monopoly.
Luckily I don’t like cricket so I will be using this any RWC

Title: Haaaard to use
Author: Ventola84
Content:
Hi Spark. 
Whoever developed the app. Please, get a refund and find someone else who is professional developer. 

This app is no logical at all, like a high school student graduate product who made overnight. 

Find someone oversea who can make a proper app. Please, or we have to unsubscribe it.

Title: Very good app
Author: cat is best friend
Content: Haven’t got any problem with this app. Can use this at multiple devices and it works fine with chrome cast as well. Love it! Good work spark people!

Title: Just awful....
Author: otago bill
Content:
I knew this would be an absolute mess but I don’t feel vindicated being proved right. Clunky, unresponsive, unintuitive junk from our mates at Spark. Feel sorry for the people who have to work there. 

Up your game spark and don’t you dare bid for rugby, cricket or americas cup!

Title: getting more stable with each update.
Author: Rahnos
Content:
Since recent updates the app has been working fine for live streaming and casting to Chromecast.
I was smart enough to check whether it worked before the big tournament (you know which one i mean) it didn’t, found Spark customer service to be unhelpful, took two weeks for them to get back to me... By then i had figured it out myself, I had ended up buying a newer Chromecast.
Have experienced NO streaming issues since the app updates pre tournament.
The negative media coverage is becoming ridiculous...

Title: Works great
Author: whakatanesam
Content: Big upgrade on Bein sports app for the EPL last year. rWC has been flawless for me.

Title: Terrible.
Author: Sea Kiwi
Content:
It’s a shockingly bad app. What’s even worse is it’s not even formatted to fit the iPhone plus / max series phones. The app fits the screen but when a game is on there are these horrible grey bars reducing screen real estate. 

Terrible all round.

Title: Useless
Author: Dirtypetenz
Content:
App performs poorly, looks good from a UI perspective but the back end is terrible.

Week before the biggest rugby event, letter arrives saying we can’t watch due to the internet at our place (provided by spark who own Spark sport). Now this is an issue but not sparks sports, so I made arrangements to view at a mates place who has 100/20. So I know that’s good. This is where the troubles start. 

Picture quality is terrible,  stutters and looses picture all the time, the 3 dots of death (buffering) and audio issues, and that’s just so far. This company were not prepared to put development into this app or the back end and have been blaming everyone or thing for the issues. The overseas streaming is done by Akamai, who appear to know what they are doing but the app constantly freezes and crashes. I’ve turned the auto update on, deleted it and reinstalled it, then not used the app and used the website and got the same results.

I should have read the reviews that pointed out constant streaming issues with smaller events. I have no faith this will be fixed without the company ducking for cover, and anticipate a copy and paste reply or passive aggressive reply about this review. Check their Facebook page for more info about the app issues and streaming issues, but be aware, they are deleting people’s comments. 

Poor effort spark sport, poor streaming and crashes has ruined the RWC for us all.

Title: Absolutely average
Author: ghost shagger
Content: Watching delayed World Cup games an you can’t fast forward ads at half time or rewind to see tries or incidents that have happened. A simple update of this would help. Frustrating at all hell

Title: Smooth stream
Author: LJE96
Content: No problems streaming via chromecast/iPhone on VDSL and fibre connections made affordable compared to getting locked into a contract with sky

Title: Minus 5 Stars
Author: Smbazalo
Content:
An absolute piece of sh**. 

Spent half the RWC games watching it buffer. Swapping in an out from just about acceptable quality to crappy 20 pixels on the screen quality. Or having to restart it cause the stream crapped itself.

Designed well. But unusable for watching the World Cup when it comes to the connection of the stream.  

:(

Title: What a joke
Author: Marossi
Content: What a joke

Title: Spark!
Author: Halalmeets
Content:
Why can’t I watch? 
It says NZ has been knocked out. ‘No further matches’

Title: Not bad... but
Author: KIWI330
Content:
Haven’t had too many problem’s but for some reason if you try to start watching game a little after kick off it doesn’t work. It only says coverage will start shortly. Real pain as I’ve missed the first 15-20 minutes of a few games during the RWC because after some time it gets annoying and switch the live feed. 
Other than that the picture quality is normally very good, I do have very good fibre though.

Title: Unreliable
Author: Redgenz
Content: Buggy, slow and unreliable. A great way to watch the RWC.

Title: So much lag on the app
Author: newsunder23
Content:
I have paid for the subscription of this app so that I can watch a decent game of football but the app isn’t half as good bein spots . The streaming doesn’t function without lagging, not even once. 
I hope they really work on this app or else they will loose the market sooner than later.

Title: Can’t Register
Author: tallllliiii
Content: How do I register for this App

Title: Good
Author: HouseCat88
Content:
Looking great at 1080p 60fps on my chromecast ultra. 
Only slight issue is the noticeable artefacting on the grass/field when the wide angle camera pans left or right ( in the World Cup rugby 2019)

It may be a technical stretch but if you could bump the bitrate to 10Mbps I think the picture would look outstanding 🙂👍🏻

Title: Unreliable
Author: JohnlivesinNZ
Content: Sometimes when watching using airplay it will work fine but half the time when I close my phone it will exit out of the live or recorded game and I will have to reconnect and find my place. I use Fibre internet so isn’t an internet issue ... :(

Title: Very limited app
Author: hexeyman
Content:
Updated review
I reviewed this several months ago during the beta release and a free trial, giving it 2 out of 5. Coming back to it recently not much has changed.

On the plus side:
-Picture quality is good on my iPhone and laptop. There are occasional pauses for buffering but nothing serious with my 100mbs fibre connection. That is the plus points done with. 

On the negative side:
- There is no search function meaning it is difficult to find what you want quickly.
- There is no way to identify the sports and events of interest to you meaning the home page is dominated with irrelevant content.
- Sound consistently becomes out of sync with the picture. The longer the event the greater the difference. For example, at the end of a 2 hour Grand Prix this is a 5 to 10 second difference. Reloading the stream doesn’t fix it.
- It is impossible to purchase access for individual sports events. You need to pay full price for everything even if you don’t want it. Interested in a particular grand prix or football match but don’t want to pay for the whole service? Tough. Pay for everything or get nothing. It is an outdated business model which doesn’t fit a streaming service. 

I still cannot recommend this product. It needs significant improvements to deliver and consistent product and pricing model which welcomes those with a passing interest to watch instead of serving die hard fans.

Title: App is pointless
Author: teeelesssa
Content: Not recommended if you want to watch Rugby World Cup. Wasted money on this. Also it kept dropping off my casting options. So there were times where I couldn’t stream to the tv had to watch it on my phone.

Title: Rubbish
Author: hatespark
Content: It casting ok sometimes and not other times...don't have any issues casting Netflix, Neon etc...just Spark Sports. Spark has ruined Sports viewing in NZ

Title: Not a Good Experience
Author: eracode
Content:
Subscribed for RWC. Watching games on-demand at off-peak times, many times during a game the picture pixelates and freezes. Also the picture is continuously switching in and out of HD all though a game. Overall not a great experience.

Watching via ultrafast fibre, iPad Pro > Chromecast > 2018 LG OLED TV.

Spark Sport promised there would be an app for this TV so we paid for the app in good faith - then they reneged on their promise. Unimpressed.

Edit: Just watched our first live game - JPN v IRE. More pixelation, freezing, buffering. Very frustrating. About half the game was at less than HD resolution. Simply not good enough. Have changed rating from 2- to 1-star.

Title: Can’t log in
Author: magnoliabl
Content: Can’t log in on my phone, even though it works fine on my laptop (and I’m logged out on my laptop, been through all the troubleshooting). Got the same problem on the TV today even though the TV worked fine previously. Rubbish!

Title: Image freeze
Author: mynameisills
Content: Image constantly freezes when there is a static graphic on screen while streaming from iPhone to AppleTV. The audio still plays however. A quick fast forward brings back the moving video.

Title: Really poor on all levels
Author: Farrofresh
Content: Really poor app - but even more so absolutely terrible marketing ads. Seriously - someone shouting ‘Spark sport’ over and over? There’s such a big disconnect between the business and users, you really need to engage in some rigorous consumer engagement sessions to understand your customer.

Title: New iOS killed chromecast
Author: Bigleftys
Content:
App works fine apart from no longer letting me cast to chromecast since I updated my iPhone to the new iOS. 

Disappointing.

Title: Not Fit For Purpose
Author: can you see RWC ?
Content: Why will this app still not load and play the content ???

Title: Works well for me
Author: PG 435
Content: The negative reviews seem exaggerated to me. I’ve watched four RWC games so far and have had no issues whatsoever. Love the lack of ads. Good on Spark for trying something new and breaking the Sky monopoly.

Title: Unreliable on iPad

Content: Poor quality stream last week but ok on laptop and phone.  This week can’t stream as get a message saying need a subscription, which I already have, and am logged in. Using phone now but it’s a faff and should work if I have an up to date subscription. 2018 iPad 9.7 in using latest OS as of 23/9/19

Title: Yos

Content: Inconsistent quality and video flow needs a lot of work can also lag a lot

Title: Rubbish app; casting problems
Author: Nitrosnav
Content: There hasn’t been a single instance where we’ve been casting video on Apple TV from the app and the video does not freeze. Every. Single. Time. Especially if there is an ad break and/or a static image on screen. Just a pathetic excuse for an app that casts to Apple TV. FIX IT PLEASE !

Title: Works well most of the time
Author: Phil_N

Title: Very poor option - find something else

I’m happy it’s working for some people, but the buffering and freezing makes live sport unwatchable for others, including me. We were able to watch the first three games with just some quality issues, but the ABs game was terrible - gave up. Want a full refund.

Title: Disappointed
Author: asteer15

Title: Just like a bar in Thailand

Title: Clunky

Content: “Watch from beginning”  option takes you to “Live”. So you see the score - not great.  “Back 10” and “forward 10” buttons intermittently disappear. Rewind scroll bar at bottom does not rewind or display the time moving back.$90 bucks for a buggy app - good one Spark!

Content: Tried to watch RWC opening ceremony last night. Clicked the button watch from beginning. Waited. "Please stay tuned scheduled program will start shortly". Waited. 20 minutes later I'm thinking it can't be that late starting so I go back a step and click watch live and there it is 20 minutes into the ceremony! Come on Spark please get it together!

Title: Disaster Rugby World Cup
Author: FloasyM
Content: Tried to watch opening game but all i got was Freezes freezes freezes- how do I get my money back?

Title: How do you even register???
Author: Graym

Title: Shayne

Title: Beware
Author: Elkabyle
Content:
Beware if you want to suspend your subscription... spark won’t let you watch any content from the date you cancel, NOT from the end of your billing cycle, unlike others like beIN or Netflix.
I suspended my account a week before the end of my cycle, thinking I could watch another week. No luck. And they don’t want to give a partial refund. They still treat customers very badly. 
Would not recommend for that reason.

Title: How do I log in
Author: Jakaree32
Content: How do I log in? I enter my email address and password and it says it’s invalid? But there’s no we’re to register??

Title: Damo
Author: Jettison5
Content: Terrible app and service. 2nd time now that a few premier league soccer games weren’t  posted for steaming. It’s opposed to be on Demand!!! Give us the service we are paying for!!!!!

Title: Hopeless, it’s useless for the rugby World Cup.
Author: the big fletch
Content:
$89 for an app that won’t run on my Apple TV 4. I have the correct app and correct Apple TV but it refuses to accept my password. 
I tried to live chat for help but it’s closed for the night, no help. 
The help page is of no help.
I have updated my Apple TV, it’s good to go. But the app is hopeless, it won’t logon. Don’t buy it, it’s not worth the money for the rugby World Cup.

Title: Worst streaming experience ever - too restrictive
Author: Danger Mouze
Content: Tells me I’m using in too many devices. I’ve only ever used on my phone and one pc. I log out my sky sport account on the pc and closed the browser. Open the app and it says I cannot watch - too many devices in use. There are no (zero) other devices in use. I understand the desire to stop sharing, but this is blocking legitimate paid for usage. Very very poor. If I need to go out part way through watching the game and want to transfer to my phone to continue watching, I won’t be able to.

Title: Ummmm
Author: wtfman88
Content: Where do I sign up for sparks sports? Only got log in....🙄

Title: Magic techno stuff!
Author: tfibfayvhin
Content: As a long-time sky subscriber I’m delighted with the new spark service. I watched a full game of football in heavy Auckland rain and didn’t get rain fade once! And all from my telephone! The future is awesome! (sorry to use a Vodafone slogan, but it’s true)

Title: Cannot Register for this
Author: Mathedemics
Content: Downloaded the app and unable to register for your product

Title: Poor quality
Author: Dave24475665
Content: The casting feature is glitchy, the football stream is horrible, often glitches even if it’s playback worse when it’s live streaming. You’d be better off using third party apps.

Title: Error occurred
Author: jazinio
Content: Wouldn’t expect items to not play at all or get half way through then freeze permanently. Commonly seen, an error occurred while playing this content, or general playback error, or cannot complete action.

Title: Complete utter joke!!!
Author: Liamdiam
Content: This has got to be one of the worst experiences I’ve ever had trying to watch EPL. Didn’t manage to catch the start of the game live so tried clicking “watch from the start” and it sent me to the live playback anyway, giving me the score I spent 2 hours successfully ignoring. The week previous it kept logging out during the live broadcast, almost every 15 minutes. Maybe you should have spent more money developing the app rather than buying the rights to the sporting events you quite clearly aren’t capable of broadcasting.

Title: Ripped off
Author: 7SMV7
Content: Tried the 7 day trial. Poor experience so cancelled. I cancelled on day 8 so they took a months subscription which is fair enough but even though I have paid for the month apparently I don't have an active subscription. Help desk is appalling. Good luck with the World Cup. My advice is keep your money.

Title: Potential, but limited options at present
Author: ExcusesofPuppets
Content:
Promising, but doesn’t seem ready.

Not many options to control bandwidth evident, stream would degrade whenever there was a lot of movement, which happens a lot in sport. Not entirely sparks fault, but it would be good to be able to manually adjust bandwidth/quality.

Menu system still a bit cluttered and confusing for me. 

Biggest issue for me is that live streams are out of sync. Audio consistently 2 seconds behind the video. I tried to fix it by looking at spark FAQ and help pages. Absolutely nothing there other than a rather condescending suggestion that I check that my decide isn’t muted. Checked google for similar apps with this issue and did that, didn’t fix it.

So I can’t continue with a sub at this stage. The audio is just too annoying. When this is fixed I’ll reconsider.

Title: Very limited App
Author: Sad Customer99
Content: Won’t allow you to use a HDMI cable with an Apple Lightening Adaptor to view streaming on a TV 😢😭😢

Title: No compatibility whatsoever
Author: The-Jim
Content:
I have a 4k 3D Tv, Apple TV an iMac and iPhone. Guess what! I can’t watch this on my tv. Absolutely shocking and don’t know how you can justify $20 a month for sport that I can’t actually watch on my tv. 

Sort. It. Out.

The agent told me they are “aware customer experience is below expectations” and “will be making changes to app and streaming services after the World Cup.” 
How convenient for all outlets selling new tvs (mine’s 2018 & doesn’t support app without new generation Apple TV/Chromecast). 
I smell a rat Spark.

Title: Blurry

Title: Underwhelming

Title: No AirPlay
Author: Hack778899
Content: How come it won’t work on my Apple TV as promised?

Title: Portrait???
Author: dupka
Content:
Ummmm - a portrait only app? Is this 2010 when the iPad 1st gen was launched? I never hold my iPad in portrait because, you know, it has a Smart Keyboard. You want to look into it - I know it's very difficult to keep up with all the new technology.

And no background playing of video? I know, I know, it's my fault for having a nice new iPad Pro that can multi-task. I should have just stuck with the 1st gen and stop watching the live sport to be able to check my email.

Title: Great start!
Author: shady01nz
Content: Very smooth and easy to use interface. Picture quality superb and buffering is negligible. Long may this continue.

Title: Solid start
Author: khiginbottom_41
Content:
Pros: Solid stream at good resolution. Casting works well to Apple TV. Good content (NBA!). 

Cons: Limited content. No Apple TV app.

Title: Good start
Author: BarelyAnEmber
Content:
As many others have noted, there is no way to register via the app.
The developer refers users to a website to register, the website insists on payment information being added to one’s account before registration can be completed.

Given we’ve been told via the media that this initial stage is really intended for beta testing, the perceived risk of forgetting about canceling the 30 day trial prior to charges being applied will, I imagine, turn a significant number of potential users (test subjects) off completing their registrations

On the upside, you’re getting consistent feedback which should be easy to implement changes to resolve. /facepalm

Title: Can’t register
Author: ChocMilk007
Content: Can’t register properly to login, keep getting a 1404 error, not looking good to be able to watch Formula One tomorrow 🙈

Title: Spark sport

Content:

Or register.

Title: Can’t register
Author: Coopnz1
Content: Open app... no option to register. Great start!

Title: Nowhere to register.
Author: teeney2
Content: Can’t register to log in.

Title: Awesome way to catch up on sports while on the go.
Author: dobbygnz
Content: Great way to catch up with some of my fav sports while on the go. Great vid quality which helps in the smaller screens.

Title: Can’t register
Author: spafranco
Content: Have sent two email with regards showing interest. Have had no reply, can’t seem to register with app. Will this be sorted in the next 36 or so hrs?

Title: Stars
Author: nothing works on this app
Content:
How can this get 4 1/2 rating when
You can’t even register to login!

Title: Registration
Author: Sam2076
Content: Am I missing something or is there no registration button?

Title: Nothing like it advertises
Author: I'm Brian
Content: The $19.99 subscription is a Utter waste of money. Very few sports options. Rather pay for sky and get the satisfaction.

Title: Thanks for the Apple TV app!
Author: Kryten NZ
Content:
Great work getting the Apple TV app out the door! 

Unfortunately playback isn’t as smooth as you competitors (yet) and uh, where’s the on screen score and clock in the RWC games that are available?

Title: Apple TV
Author: MitchSin19
Content: Is really glitchy when trying to use through Apple TV. Keeps stoping and losing its place. Seems to have started with new update.

Title: Just sound .. no video
Author: 001suri01
Content: When I connect phone to tv via hdmi.. just sound no video... what’s d solution..??

Title: Yuk
Author: Supasoaker75
Content:
Not a user friendly app. Can’t turn subscriptions on and off in the app. Each time I’ve wanted to use it I’m on the chat and have to reinstall it. 

All this from someone who was a paying user!

Good luck with the World Cup, your going to need it if my experience is anything to go by.

Title: Casting problem
Author: alau90
Content: Most of the time, I am having issues casting formula one on the Chromecast, but it works on the mobile device. Are you guys able to fix the issue? If this keeps up I'm unsubscribing spark sports.

Title: Needs more content
Author: Rockybainski
Content:
Very limited amount of hockey, particularly looking for the European games eg Belgium vs Germany.

Also lags when watching f1. If this is the only option for RWC I suspect the nation will be very disappointed

Title: App doesn’t work
Author: toomuchadsruingames
Content: Every time I try logging in it say there’s a login error, tried multiple times and still the same issue. Tried signing in online and the screen just goes back. Hopefully this isn’t an issue when the rwc is on

Title: Terrible
Author: Golfboy-72
Content: Spark should be ashamed of this app. Quality is terrible... pushed for RWC, yet cannot AirPlay to an Apple TV despite saying it does. Can’t give a lower rating otherwise I would...

Title: Ok but needs work
Author: Zunk01
Content: Even though I am logged in and have purchased a Rugby Tournament Pass I am getting ads asking me to purchase one - confusing and unnecessary.

Title: Flips to sideways orientation on iPad
Author: LiveMC
Content: Impossible to watch - app rotates itself sideways when iPad Pro is in standard landscape mode ready for video.

Title: Not loading
Author: wwyypppi
Content: Just a blank screen when trying to load videos just now

Title: Landscape mode poor on ipad
Author: TigersRugbyFan
Content: The app on iPad only presents its UI in portrait mode, but who wants to watch tv like that? Sure, landscape works after you hit playback, but you keep having to rotate your iPad when going between playback and doing anything else. Poor design, but should be easy to fix. Hopefully will be done before RWC.

Title: Rubbish
Author: crazydogs3
Content: Worst app I have ever used. If I could watch formula one any other way I would ditch this app in a heartbeat. Glitchy, freezes, takes forever to even start. Spark sport need to get their act together and provide something that works reliably for the costs. Absolute rubbish!

Title: Poor
Author: siftycat
Content:
No smart TV apps, no Xbox or PS4 apps, and this poor quality app requires extra hardware to mirror to a TV. Two months in and no sign of any other apps. Premier League Pass, Bein Sports and Sky Sports Fan Pass are all failures because companies don't get that customers want a consistent delivery system. This will also fail because Spark think that they just have to buy up the rights and not bother with the having people see it part. If I buy extra hardware to watch the stuff Spark bought the rights to but didn't bother working on the delivery system then that's my budget blown and I'll just have to carry on using free streams.

Your move, Spark.

Title: Constantly glitches
Author: nique021
Content: This app is very average. Constantly stops playing, or audio continues while pic freezes. Very frustrating when ur watching something.

Title: Portrait
Author: peecee09
Content: This app must be altered so it can be viewed in landscape format, not portrait. So old fashioned. The same applies to your My Spark apps.So many hiccups need remedial action in such a short time !

Title: Suggestions for improvement
Author: Nikadma
Content: Hello, be helpful if there was an in app feedback section. Also if you could set reminders for events in the future.

Title: Long way to go !
Author: Flergiswan
Content: Seems like a beta app. The app just crashed after clicking on the NBA icon I restarted then it did it again. Worked 3rd time lucky.

Title: Spark Sport
Author: Seini
Content: Most apps that require login give an account creation option. Not Spark Sport! Just a login in option. As a spark customer I tried my spark account credentials-no joy!! What’s the point of an app that requires login if you can’t create one?

Title: Poor, if you have an iPad
Author: MikeT60
Content:
Treats mobile devices like a phone, but I watch my streaming sport in landscape on my iPad.

How hard is it to develop for both platforms? 

Also, spark sports website is primitive - sign up doesn’t have any modern HTML tags for pref-filling name, address, card details etc.

Get with it spark. At the moment you’re not impressing.

Title: Very buggy with Apple TV
Author: Camionista33
Content: Will delete after free trial if functionality doesn't improve. Currently very unreliable.

Title: Pathetic app
Author: Niiiceguy
Content:
1. Doesn’t tell you if you’re being charged when you download the app (hope I wasn’t charged ☠️
2. Doesn’t tell you or explain how to sign. 
3. Misleading (very)

Title: Bit of a hit and miss with this app.
Author: Alexmichaelwatson
Content: Casting to a big screen via sharing is a bit tricky. Worked one day, next day it doesn’t. Playback is good

Title: Spark Sport
Author: JoniP
Content:
Needs a message on opening App that you must sign up on
Web browser. Nearly gave up trying to work that out. Basics are important developers!!
REALLY NEEDS a forward and back 10sec shuffle button like Netflix & Amazon Prime. 
To get a professional sport viewing App they should study how Dorma does MotoGP App. Bookmarks are sorely missed here.

Title: Does most things I wanted.
Author: fntjv#@$
Content:
Some are quick to criticise without fully exploring the functionality of the app. 
The only shortcoming seems to be that when casting, the resume point on the (iPad) doesn’t synch with the true point in a replay if the iPad has been locked during replay. 
Or am I also jumping to a false assumption?

Title: Missed the ball
Author: moresand
Content: Got up early to watch F1 took us an hour to try and get it loaded had to watch first half on small iPhone as wouldn't go to start of programme if connected to tv then showed live and spoilt the result before we even started watching. once finished live we screened on tv. Really hard to rewind accurately with just a tiny line on iPhone. You should have had it fully sorted prior to start of season -give it to duke or fully back to sky including the practises and preshows. Only got app for F1. Looking for any other options to watch

Title: “Play from start” function is not working
Author: F1 Fan Forza
Content: Tried to watch F1 this morning. The button “watch from start” is not working. When chosen , took me to live screen and spoiled the results.

Title: Failed again
Author: Quality.……
Content:
For the second week of trying to watch F1, the app has failed to deliver. Constantly buffering the video feed, casting to the big screen from iPad and the program jumps out of time and fails to show anything. After reloading the app on the iPhone and iPad this problem continues. 

I’d like to think before any monthly subscriptions are taken they will address this failing app.

Title: Needs weekly updates
Author: Bobbyhi
Content: There’s no search function so trying to find what you want to watch comes down to blindly swiping around hoping what you want to watch appears. Still cuts to random still pictures through f1 practices. Still have hope though.

Title: Not ready for public use
Author: jeds dad
Content:
Having waited to watch F1 practice 1 decided to try practice 2 still unable to watch spark please advise how long is
“Stay tunes coverage begins shortly”
How long is shortly?

Title: Poor on chrome cast
Author: michels16
Content: Frequently video cuts out on chrome cast. Watching on high speed internet and chrome cast doesn’t fail on other apps sites we use. Also even when using the iPad the video cuts out and all that is on screen is the f1 and sky sports logo along with audio.

Title: How to register
Author: thitcvjutcvv
Content: Hi, how can I register for this app. I’ve downloaded it but I only see login not sign up..

Title: Well Done
Author: e3ra
Content:
Great app. I had wonderful experience with the app watching F1.
Only issue is AirPlay dropping off if I receive calls on my phone

Title: Potential
Author: TheKashmeister
Content: From my usage of Spark Sports, it is a new app and there are some flaws and hiccups. However, for a brand new app, I am happy with the performance of it. I look forward to Spark Sports growing and continue to fine-tune the app and seamless streaming and catch-up to combat the criminal pricing and lacklustre performance of Sky Sports.

Title: Airplay
Author: KarlNZ
Content: Apple airplay did not work, hard watching on the iphone..

Title: Need way more sport
Author: Appl3Pies
Content: Pretty impressed with the app itself but the content is lacking so far.

Title: Has potential
Author: Boredtaxi
Content:
The start from beginning feature doesn’t seem to be working which is disappointing.

We wanted to watch the F1 and missed the first 25 laps. 

Other than that the stream is pretty good, no lag issues, constant high quality picture.

The menu could use a little work. Looking forward to see how this develops before the rugby World Cup.

Title: App crash!!!!
Author: DewaldNZ
Content:
After a few minutes of viewing F1 in all the sessions, the app keeps crashing!!
Please fix urgently because it’s utterly annoying!! 1 star rating at most!!!!!!!

Title: UI design 101
Author: Burfot
Content:
Honour my orientation settings. 
But wait: Spark knows better...
Sky had the same attitude....

Title: Portrait Only?
Author: Joshynz
Content:
I know the service is in Beta, but being portrait only on iPad while navigating the app is highly annoying!
Otherwise the stream and video quality seems good.
I’m a little confused with the portrait only as a swear when I initially downloaded the app it was also landscape? Maybe I was imagining it.

Title: Potential but lack of functions
Author: Asasul
Content: The app need work to improve functions such as notifications and a calendar to allow you to locate relevant items to watch. Currently the f1 qualification doesn’t show up immediately after the session has finished - and it’s been over an hour since the season finished. Not good enough.

Title: Lacks some basic functions
Author: mclovin nz
Content: Can’t watch a stream which is in progress from the start of the broadcast when using chromecast.  iPad app lets me go back to the start but when I start casting it only shows the live coverage and I can’t jump to earlier in the broadcast.

Title: What a hassle
Author: Are you kidding...
Content: After spending about an hour trying to resolve an issue with credit card details not having been loaded in the first instance to start the free trial (and not being able to load these at a later time), it finally launched, then I found out there is no app for smart tvs, then the website wouldn’t load on the web browser for the tv, then when I set my computer up with an HDMI link to the TV, it crashed!  Then I watched only half of the qualifying series for F1 on Duke with very poor picture.

Title: This is a horrible app
Author: john 1029384756
Content: I was going to go watch formula 1 qualifying and we clicked the watch from beginning option and it took us to the live view spoiling the results ruining everything. The app also has a few hours of dead screen before qualifying started so you had to fast forward to where you thought it should start and hope you didn’t over shoot it. Fast forward it’s self didn’t work. When we first got on to qualifying and it took us to the live view we couldn’t rewind at all without the app jumping right back to live mode. This is one of the biggest disappointments in an app I’ve ever seen. It’s completely useless.

Title: No Commentary for F1??
Author: Kiwi Dave 345
Content:
Picture quality seems good early in the morning without many users online, but why is there no commentary for the F1 practices??
Surely Spark didn’t cut corners and buy broadcast rights without commentary??!!!
WRC is the full format. Nice to be able to binge watch highlight packages

Title: Commentary?
Author: my.name.jiff
Content: Just watching the first F1 practice of the season trying to get an insight into this year and there is no commentary?! Did Spark not buy the rights to this? What’s the story here and when will this improve?

Title: Has potential but needs work to make it stable
Author: Hduejebriskwjsh
Content: After taking a while to resolve account issues, in the first F1 practice session the app crashed once, failed to stream another time and during the course of the whole session repeatedly had the audio cutting out. I’m watching on high speed connection so i doubt the issue from my connection. The app interface is decent, though you have to manage account externally to the app and appears to require a pc - it couldn’t change app settings on phone browser. There is good potential but this is clearly an early release. By the way, quite nice to have so many 5 star reviews before the app even went live which are clearly bogus. Rather than patting yourselves on the back, please work on improving it! There’s no way this is close to 5 stars and you know it.

Title: Unable to setup
Author: YrREguy
Content:
It asks me to logon but I’m not even registered?
When I go Thru the process I ask to reset password and it’s unable to do that right now.
How can Apple even let this on the store when it’s so buggy or not working
